summary: Mikhail Gorbachev, the final leader of the Soviet Union, starred in a 1998 Pizza Hut ad. Filmed in Moscow's Red Square and a Pizza Hut, the ad shows a family debating Gorbachev's legacy. A woman credits him with bringing Pizza Hut to Russia. Gorbachev earned money from the ad to fund his foundation's projects. This ad symbolizes capitalism's success in the former Soviet Union.
title: Mikhail Gorbachev Pizza Hut commercial
